interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: True by Made Beautiful Hydrating Hair Butter 12oz
Review Date: 2017/01/25
Store: Made Beautiful
Product Description: ['True by Made Beautiful Hydrating Hair Butter (12oz) defines hair while providing intense moisture and controlling frizz. This nourishing styling butter features a unique blend of honey and mango to provide ultimate moisture as well as shea butter and coconut that penetrates hair to nourish from cuticle to root. True Hydrating Hair Butter is a must have for twisting, Bantu knots, braiding or simply defining your curl pattern. True Hydrating Hair Butter is sulfate-free and paraben-free.']
Average Rating: 4.2
Product Details: {'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '3.6 x 3.6 x 2.7 inches; 12 Ounces', 'Item model number': '8.52788E+11', 'UPC': '852788006503', 'Manufacturer': 'MADE BEAUTIFUL'}
Review Text: I bought this with other products from the same line and I love the other products but I felt like this hair butter dried my hair out a little , but it does smell amazing.
Review Title: Hair Butter
Rating: 3.0
--------------------------------------------------

Jojoba Oil - Golden - 8 oz, Safety sealed container, Soap making, lotion, creams, massage oil, bath, beauty, lip balm
Traverse Bay Soap Company
['Jojoba Oil - Golden - 8oz- Jojoba Oil is a light oil and is great for people with sensitive skin. It works well as a skin moisturizer as well as a hair conditioner. Jojoba Oil helps to relieve dry and cracked skin, as well as reducing dandruff. We share our commitment with our producers/manufacturers to source only the highest quality ingredients, using fair-trade farming practices as well as organically grown crops. Water and oil resistant labelling, so you will always know what’s in your bottle. All of our oils are sold by weight not volume. All are weighed on digital scales, by hand. Oils vary widely in density. So oil levels in bottles vary depending on oil. Most soap and personal care product recipes are measured by weight not volume. MPORTANT:\xa0All Traverse Bay Bath And Body products are for external use only unless otherwise indicated. This information is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent any disease, and it should not be used by anyone who is pregnant or under the care of a medical practitioner. Essential Oils must be properly diluted before use in order to avoid any damages to property or adverse physical effects (including injury or bodily harm)']
{'Brand': 'Traverse Bay Soap Company', 'Item Form': 'Oil', 'Active Ingredients': 'Jojoba', 'Unit Count': '8.0 Ounce', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Item Weight': '8 Ounces', 'UPC': '689860001756', 'Manufacturer': 'Traverse Bay Bath and Body'}
This is some good stuff , it's light weight with a light smell , I just wish it came in a 8 oz bottle instead of a jug for easier poring,  I do love it and will definitely repurchase.

**Updated User Profile Summary:**

- **Product Affinity:** The user continues to show a strong preference for high-quality personal grooming tools and products that enhance skin and hair health. Their interest in elegant and functional accessories remains evident, as they seek items that not only perform well but also add a touch of style to their grooming routine.
  
- **Performance Orientation:** While they prioritize effectiveness, recent experiences suggest a nuanced approach, indicating that they may be open to evaluating products based on balance between performance and sensory experience. Their latest purchase illustrates a willingness to explore diverse formulations, although they prioritize moisture delivery.

- **Inclusivity:** The user's preference for versatile, family-friendly products remains intact, highlighting a continued focus on usability for various personal care needs.

- **Satisfaction Rating:** Satisfaction with products remains high, although recent feedback indicates a critical perspective regarding certain formulations, showing they are discerning about the products they choose and are not afraid to express mixed feelings.

- **User Experience:** The user values design elegance alongside quality and effectiveness. Their varied experiences reflect a consistent pursuit of well-crafted products, blending practicality with beauty, while also showcasing a readiness to explore new options that may enhance their grooming experience.

Overall, the user’s profile highlights an evolving journey in personal care, characterized by an appreciation for both functionality and aesthetic appeal, while maintaining a keen eye for product performance and suitability.
